column4: Hi guys, i understand it's possible to install ubuntu from knoppix. i've seen the documentation on the wiki page about doing an install over a network with knoppix. is it possible to install ubuntu from knoppix with the install cd?
that sounds So convuluted - its scary :P
Hmm cant help ya there.. been checking the md5's and so forth on the iso images?
sounds like a cd/dvd drive issue to me.  or cable issues.
